email_text:
Subject: Urgent: Action Required to Verify Your PayPal Account

Dear Valued PayPal Customer,

We regret to inform you that we have detected some unusual activity on your PayPal account. In order to protect your account and prevent any unauthorized access, we require you to verify your account information immediately.

Please click on the link below to verify your account:
[Phishing link]

Failure to verify your account within the next 24 hours may result in the temporary suspension of your account. We take the security of our customers very seriously and we urge you to act promptly to avoid any inconvenience.

Thank you for your cooperation in this matter.

Sincerely,
PayPal Customer Support Team

Please note that PayPal will never ask you to provide your password or sensitive information via email. If you have any doubts about the authenticity of this email, please contact our customer support team immediately.
